							            Recurrent Vulvar Cancer
							            Recurrent vulvar cancer is cancer that has recurred (come back) after it has been treated. The cancer may come back in the vulva or in other parts of the body.",CancerGov,Vulvar Cancer
What are the symptoms of Vulvar Cancer ?,"Signs of vulvar cancer include bleeding or itching. V
